summary: REQ-1 appears implemented (AdminPage header + tab labels now use i18n keys). REQ-3 and REQ-4 show no evidence of implementation (no changes to BenchHistoryList). REQ-2 is partially evidenced but the AdminBenchesPanel diff is truncated and AdminDocumentsPanel still contains some hardcoded UI literals (e.g., version prefix). REQ-5 is partially evidenced (new TranslationKey entries shown) but translation dictionary values for en-US/fr-FR are not visible in the truncated diff.

missing_requirements.requirement: Localize all remaining user-facing strings in AdminBenchesPanel and AdminDocumentsPanel, including dialog buttons and other UI text.
missing_requirements.reason: AdminBenchesPanel is truncated so confirmation dialog button labels and any remaining strings cannot be verified. Additionally, AdminDocumentsPanel still includes a hardcoded version prefix string (`v`) and separator literals that are user-facing.

missing_requirements.requirement: Localize bench history action labels in BenchHistoryList using a robust mapping with fallback to raw strings.
missing_requirements.reason: No diff entry shows any modifications to `frontend/src/pages/Benches/components/BenchHistoryList.tsx` or any new mapping logic for `entry.action` localization.

missing_requirements.requirement: Format bench history timestamps using the current app language/locale (e.g., toLocaleString(currentLocale)).
missing_requirements.reason: No diff entry shows any modifications to bench history timestamp formatting or use of the current locale in the history list component.

missing_requirements.requirement: Add required Admin + history translation keys and provide values for both fr-FR and en-US so no missing translations occur.
missing_requirements.reason: The diff shows many new `TranslationKey` union entries, but the file is truncated and does not show the actual en-US and fr-FR dictionary values for the new keys, so completeness cannot be verified from the provided diff.

hallucinated_features.description: Added many admin-related translation keys that are not explicitly requested by REQ-1/REQ-2 (e.g., permissions/profile/dashboard-related admin keys).
hallucinated_features.reason: BuildRequest only calls out Admin header/tabs and Benches/Documents panels plus bench history localization. The diff shows additional admin keys such as `admin.checkingPermissions`, `admin.accessDenied`, `admin.loadingProfile`, `admin.dashboardLayout`, etc., which are not mentioned as required scope.

hallucinated_features.description: Modified/added tracking entries in project_state.json marking new feature requests as pending.
hallucinated_features.reason: BuildRequest does not mention updating `project_state.json`; this appears to be auxiliary metadata rather than a requested product change.
